text: E dughiar bar otevimɨn nguazir kamɨn iti, ezɨ en ikɨrɨmɨrim, a dagheba puvatɨgha uaghan an mɨngariba mongezɨ e dagh fozir puvatɨgha okam nɨghnɨsi. En ikɨrɨmɨrim, mati ghuariam aruem apazazɨma, temer dughuazim zuamɨram arav ghu. Ezɨ tina kamaghɨn fo, e arazir aghuir manamɨn gɨntɨgham? Ezɨ tina kamaghɨn fo, e ovegh gɨvaghtɨ, bizir manaba overiamɨn apengan otivam?
